title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: AI-based Educational Tools for Moral Education Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning content linked to moral values (e.g., honesty, cooperation, perseverance) using AI-based animation creation tools.
Through case analysis and thematic discussion activities, learners can evaluate and improve educational application strategies for AI tools.
Learners can measure the learning effectiveness (moral development, language proficiency improvement) of AI-generated content using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
